{{Quote|Gordo, to the stewards.|[[Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]]|You Win or You Die}}
'''Gordo''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made Steward of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no member of the Night's Watch called Gordo.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Gordo is present during the speech Lord Commander [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. Gordo is assigned to the stewards.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
